message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140, and I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go much lower. I'll offer it to you for $155, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
